title: White Silk Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a white silk midi wrap dress, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, delicate waist tie belt, subtle sheen, no model, no mannequin, no human, garment-only view
techpack: White silk midi wrap dress with short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, self-fabric waist tie belt, hidden side zipper closure, topstitching along neckline and hem, unlined for lightweight drape, finished with narrow rolled hem.
design_text:
White Silk Midi Wrap Dress (WD-SLK-001)

Sleeves: short flutter sleeves

Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
